Hi I am having a problem.  These are the steps I took beforehand:

1: Unpacked
2: Ran Portal.2.Update.3.exe to install game
3: Copied content from SKIDROW folder to Portal 2 folder (it overwrote a few things)

Then it told me "steam_api.dll" was missing so I downloaded that

Ran the game again but now it says:
"The procedure entry point SteamAPI_GetSteamInstallPath could not be located in the dynamic link library steam_api.dll"

How can I fix this?  Do I need to get a better dll or something?  I tried reinstalling but got the same error.

Help would be much appreciated; this is the only legit-seeming download of the full game I've found.
Got this to work when I put what's in the portal 2/Bin folder into BOTH Bin folders of the game installation.
Yea same , no problem installing and game runs fine but still co-op doesn't work .

@ Zev747:
steam_api.dll should be inside Portal 2\bin directory. It was there for me since I initially installed the game, even without any updates.

@ Furious1964 
HEy thanks man that was the problem with crashes at the begining

I'm having the exact same issue as Zev747 if anyone could shed some light.

I added the steam_api.dll (after getting it online) to both bin folders, only to get the error Zev spoke of. any ideas?

I'm curious if I actually have all the game files I need... is everything necessary to play Portal 2 included in this download?

Just for clarification, my Portal 2 folder has the following items in it:

bin (folder)
portal2 (folder)
COOP
Launcher
Portal2
SKIDROW

Steamclient.dll

Hi, I suggest to not use anything other than extremzone for portal 2 cracks. Update 1 is the most stable crack out there. I got random crashes with other updates and sometime you can find a patch.exe file ( about 128k) never touch that file. extremezone doesnt have it because you dont need it. YOu can still play coop with update 1 with tunngle just make sure your partner doesnt use the other deceptive updates.
Hi all, was getting CTDs prior to installing this but after everything went smoothly. Saved games will be erased after applying though. But you can start a new game starting from any chapter
